channel.title: [pi] adding special attack rep ++
channel.description:
hey i wanna know how you add a special bar / what folder i added it i think i know but im not 100% sure
wanna add a special bar on there [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture221.png[/img]
this is the weapon i wanna be adding a special too [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture218.png[/img]

item.title: [pi] adding special attack rep ++
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:6, topic:422331”]Find “4151” Which is normal whip and add the vine whip id on top or under that case

or search for anything like this in itemassistant.

case 1215:// dragon dagger         
case 1231:         
case 13899:         
case 10887:         
case 5680:         
case 13905:         
case 5698:         
case 1305: // dragon long         
case 11694:         
case 11698:         
case 11700:          //SOL         
case 11730:         
case 11696:        
 c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7574);          
specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7586);        
break;

and in between the lines add

case XXXX

Replace the “XXXX” with vine whip id[/quote]
kk thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] adding special attack rep ++
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Find “4151” Which is normal whip and add the vine whip id on top or under that case

or search for anything like this in itemassistant.

case 1215:// dragon dagger         
case 1231:         
case 13899:         
case 10887:         
case 5680:         
case 13905:         
case 5698:         
case 1305: // dragon long         
case 11694:         
case 11698:         
case 11700:          //SOL         
case 11730:         
case 11696:        
 c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7574);          
specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7586);        
break;

and in between the lines add

case XXXX

Replace the “XXXX” with vine whip id

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] adding special attack rep ++

item.description:
@Cygnui wrote:

Add the item name in ItemAssistant.java

item.title: [pi] adding special attack rep ++
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

50percentelf:

You’ll also have to add it into combatassistant.java if you want the spec to do anything. i would recommend looking around for a guide on like korasi or something that you can look through and figure out how to add specials from.

done this bit combatassistant.java but i need to add the special button so you click it

Read full topic
